parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The initial array to populate the state. Default: []

returnValues.name: push
returnValues.description: Appends a new item to the end of the array.

returnValues.name: insert
returnValues.description: Inserts a new item at the specified index.

returnValues.name: update
returnValues.description: Updates an item at the specified index.

returnValues.name: remove
returnValues.description: Removes an item at the specified index.
